q: If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.
h:
“If you're waiting until you feel talented enough to make it, you'll never make it.” —
Criss Jami

q: How you think is as important as as what you think.
h:
“How you think is as important as as what you think.” —
Unknown

q: Become the kind of leader that people would follow voluntarily, even if you had no title or position.
h:
“Become the kind of leader that people would follow voluntarily, even if you had no title or position.” —
Brian Tracy

q: Being In The Present Means Tuning Out Distractions And Paying Attention To What Is Important, Now.
h:
“Being In The Present Means Tuning Out Distractions And Paying Attention To What Is Important, Now.” —
Spencer Johnson

q: Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.
h:
“Nature does not hurry, yet everything is accomplished.” —
Lao Tzu

q: Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak.
h:
“Appear weak when you are strong, and strong when you are weak.” —
Sun Tzu

q: Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.
h:
“Aim for the moon. If you miss, you may hit a star.” —
W. Clement Stone

q: Yesterday is but today's memory, tomorrow is today's dream.
h:
“Yesterday is but today's memory, tomorrow is today's dream.” —
Kahlil Gibran

q: You need to be doing fewer things for more effect instead of doing more things with side effects.
h:
“You need to be doing fewer things for more effect instead of doing more things with side effects.” —
Gary Keller

q: Only when you can be extremely pliable and soft can you be extremely hard and strong.
h:
“Only when you can be extremely pliable and soft can you be extremely hard and strong.” —
Zen Proverb

q: Sorrow is how we learn to love.
h:
“Sorrow is how we learn to love.” —
Rita Mae Brown

q: Learn the rules like a pro, so you can break them like an artist.
h:
“Learn the rules like a pro, so you can break them like an artist.” —
Pablo Picasso

q: Dreams are the touchstones of our characters.
h:
“Dreams are the touchstones of our characters.” —
Henry David Thoreau

q: The strongest and sweetest songs yet remain to be sung.
h:
“The strongest and sweetest songs yet remain to be sung.” —
Walt Whitman

q: The big secret in life is that there is no big secret. Whatever your goal, you can get there if you're willing to work.
h:
“The big secret in life is that there is no big secret. Whatever your goal, you can get there if you're willing to work.” —
Oprah Winfrey

q: Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone elses. life.
h:
“Your time is limited, so don't waste it living someone elses. life.” —
Steve Jobs

q: Fallacies do not cease to be fallacies because they become fashions.
h:
“Fallacies do not cease to be fallacies because they become fashions.” —
Gilbert Chesterton

q: Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.
h:
“Don't spend time beating on a wall, hoping to transform it into a door.” —
Coco Chanel

q: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
h:
“Champions keep playing until they get it right.” —
Billie Jean King

q: One of the oldest human needs is having someone to wonder where you are when you don't come home at night.
h:
“One of the oldest human needs is having someone to wonder where you are when you don't come home at night. ” —
Margaret Mead

q: If you focus on success, you'll have stress. But if you pursue excellence, success will be guaranteed.
h:
“If you focus on success, you'll have stress. But if you pursue excellence, success will be guaranteed.” —
Deepak Chopra

q: In order for you to be the BEST you can be for others, first you must be BEST for yourself.
h:
“In order for you to be the BEST you can be for others, first you must be BEST for yourself.” —
Jeffrey Gitomer

q: We turn not older with years but newer every day.
h:
“We turn not older with years but newer every day.” —
Emily Dickinson

q: Because a thing seems difficult for you, do not think it impossible.
h:
“Because a thing seems difficult for you, do not think it impossible.” —
Marcus Aurelius

q: Insanity: doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results.
h:
“Insanity: doing the same thing over and over again and expecting different results.” —
Albert Einstein

q: It is very obvious that we are not influenced by 'facts' but by our interpretation of the facts.
h:
“It is very obvious that we are not influenced by 'facts' but by our interpretation of the facts.” —
Alfred Adler

q: Anger begins with folly, and ends with repentance.
h:
“Anger begins with folly, and ends with repentance. ” —
Beverly Sills

q: Know your gifts and share them.
h:
“Know your gifts and share them.” —
Les Brown

q: Why live an ordinary life, when you can live an extraordinary one.
h:
“Why live an ordinary life, when you can live an extraordinary one.” —
Tony Robbins

q: We've got to live, no matter how many skies have fallen.
h:
“We've got to live, no matter how many skies have fallen.” —
D. H. Lawrence

q: We are all self-made, but only the successful will admit it.
h:
“We are all self-made, but only the successful will admit it.” —
Earl Nightingale

q: From a certain point onward there is no longer any turning back. That is the point that must be reached.
h:
“From a certain point onward there is no longer any turning back. That is the point that must be reached.” —
Franz Kafka

q: If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. If they don't, they never were.
h:
“If you love somebody, let them go, for if they return, they were always yours. If they don't, they never were.” —
Kahlil Gibran

q: Don't look for meaning in the words. Listen to the silences.
h:
“Don't look for meaning in the words. Listen to the silences.” —
Samuel Beckett

q: I would rather be a little nobody, then to be an evil somebody.
h:
“I would rather be a little nobody, then to be an evil somebody.” —
Abraham Lincoln

q: Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.
h:
“Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love.” —
Mother Teresa

q: Everything that is made beautiful and fair and lovely is made for the eye of one who sees.
h:
“Everything that is made beautiful and fair and lovely is made for the eye of one who sees.” —
Rumi

q: FEAR has two meanings: 'Forget Everything And Run' or 'Face Everything And Rise.' The choice is yours.
h:
“FEAR has two meanings: 'Forget Everything And Run' or 'Face Everything And Rise.' The choice is yours.” —
Zig Ziglar

q: Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.
h:
“Life is not a problem to be solved, but a reality to be experienced.” —
Soren Kierkegaard

q: Most of us live our lives by accident - we live as it happens. Fulfilment comes when we live our lives on purpose.
h:
“Most of us live our lives by accident - we live as it happens. Fulfilment comes when we live our lives on purpose.” —
Simon Sinek

q: Why do you stay in prison when the door is so wide open?
h:
“Why do you stay in prison when the door is so wide open?” —
Rumi

q: People spend too much time doing and not enough time thinking about what they should be doing.
h:
“People spend too much time doing and not enough time thinking about what they should be doing.” —
Naval Ravikant

q: There is a big difference between being centered and being self-centered.
h:
“There is a big difference between being centered and being self-centered.” —
Lolly Daskal

q: Success on the outside means nothing unless you also have success within.
h:
“Success on the outside means nothing unless you also have success within.” —
Robin Sharma

q: If it entertains you now but will bore you someday, it's a distraction. Keep looking.
h:
“If it entertains you now but will bore you someday, it's a distraction. Keep looking.” —
Naval Ravikant

q: Work is always an antidote to depression.
h:
“Work is always an antidote to depression.” —
Eleanor Roosevelt

q: Adults are just children who earn money.
h:
“Adults are just children who earn money.” —
Kenneth Branagh

q: Don't try to be young. Just open your mind. Stay interested in stuff.
h:
“Don't try to be young. Just open your mind. Stay interested in stuff.” —
Betty White

q: Today will never happen again. Don't waste it with a false start or no start at all.
h:
“Today will never happen again. Don't waste it with a false start or no start at all.” —
Og Mandino

q: There are more people who wish to be loved than there are who are willing to love.
h:
“There are more people who wish to be loved than there are who are willing to love. ” —
Nicolas Chamfort
